sentences.sContent: Proponents of the PhD argue that it is worthwhile even if it does not lead to permanent academic employment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Proponents of the PhD argue that it is worthwhile even if it does not lead to permanent academic employment.
sentences.sCn: 支持者争辩说，即使找不到终身从事学术研究的工作，攻读博士学位也是值得的。

sentences.sContent: Firstly, you have to get a PhD, but if you want to practise you then need venture capital, otherwise you don't have the tools.
sentences.sContent_eng: Firstly, you have to get a PhD, but if you want to practise you then need venture capital, otherwise you don't have the tools.
sentences.sCn: 首先，你必须弄到一个哲学博士学位，但是如果你想执业的话还要有创业资本。 要不然你就拿不到仪器。

trans.tranCn: 博士学位；哲学博士学位（Doctor of Philosophy）
